ace_zero.agents.diff_game_agent.park_stern_conversion module¶

Implementation of the techniques discussed in the paper:

Differential Game Based Air Combat Maneuver Generation Using Scoring Function Matrix H. Park, B.-Y. Lee, M.-J. Tahk, D.-W. Yoo International Journal of Aeronautical and Space Sciences, number 17, vol 2, pages 204-213 2016
